short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables detection of modifying keys like right-click, control, or shift on scratch and turbowarp.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is completely unofficial. For more information please visit the Github: https://github.com/dexthecool/rightclick
